data.eml:eml: Taxonomic and nomenclatural notes on Agrilus suvorovi Obenberger (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Agrilinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jendek, Eduard (2002): Taxonomic and nomenclatural notes on Agrilus suvorovi Obenberger (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Agrilinae). Zootaxa 52: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156027
